name: withdraw
effect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise DEFENSE.
flavor_text.emerald: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user withdraws its body in its hard shell, raising its DEFENSE stat.
